class.name: NavigationMeshAreaPolygon3D
class.brief_description: An axis-aligned area with a projected shape of a closed polygon to affect navigation mesh geometry and properties (when baked).

method.name: are_vertices_clockwise
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if [member vertices] are winded in clockwise order.

method.name: are_vertices_valid
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if [member vertices] create a valid, not self-overlapping shape.

members.member: The vertices that define the outline of the projected area shape.
